feature.label: Call Graph
feature.description:
The Call Graph Plug-in renders the current Call Hierarchy tree view as a directed graph using GraphViz dot program (which must be installed separately).
Also adds three varying options of removing nodes from the tree view to help focus what will appear in the graph.
Supports Eclipse 3.0, 3.1, 3.2, 3.4
Home page: http://clabs.org/jdt
